page.title: 03Education of Norham children
page.content: Children aged 3 to 5 attend Nursery class 3 half days per week, this is held in Norham Primary school. 5-9 year olds attend the primary school in the village. 9-13 year olds travel by double-decker bus 7 miles to Berwick upon Tweed to the Berwick middle school. This school serves Berwick town and country areas but excludes the Tweedmouth areas. 13-16 year olds also travel on the bus, but this time to the High School which serves the entire Berwick area. Those planning on sitting Advanced level exams stay at the High school until 18. A small amount of further education facilities are in the annexe at the High school, but most full-time students move to the cities to live and attend Universities or Polytec's in order to take a 4 year degree.
